actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To fully exempt persons with disabilities from the prohibition against providing section 8 rental assistance to college students.
short_title: Fairness for Disabled Students Act of 2007

summary.text: Fairness for Disabled Students Act of 2007 - Amends federal housing law to exempt from the prohibition against specified public housing rental assistance ("Section 8 assistance") persons with disabilities who were not receiving such assistance as of November 30, 2005.

titles.title: Fairness for Disabled Students Act of 2007
To fully exempt persons with disabilities from the prohibition against providing section 8 rental assistance to college students.
